landing.Somos una empresa de Fintech que diseña,: We're a Fintech company that designs, validates and applies financial solutions to build winning portfolios and profitable strategies in the financial markets.
landing.RCA Capital nace como una empresa destin: RCA Capital was born as a company destined to manage the Claro Araque family assets as well as to serve the Santander region with top quality financial education products. Over time, its founder Roberto Claro managed to identify very specific needs in terms of financial guidance in the Spanish-speaking population and evolved its business model by creating three lines of service to address and solve different problems and needs that involve money as a tool: Investments and Wealth Management, professional trading in international financial markets and a specific line of personal and family finances
landing.Recibe nuestros análisis y reportes de l: Receive our analyzes and reports on financial markets, information on new projects, strategies and more!

aboutUs.Proporcionamos orientación, guía y poten: We provide guidance and solution empowerment through:
aboutUs.Herramientas tecnológicas propias que ha: Proprietary technological tools that have been created in response to specific problems in the optimal allocation of capital for investment and trading. We are a Fintech that generates specific and personalized results for each situation of our clients.
aboutUs.Contenido educacional de calidad generad: Quality educational content generated from more than 13 years of experience in international financial markets.
aboutUs.RRCA Capital nace como una empresa desti: RCA Capital was born as a company destined to manage the Claro Araque family assets as well as to serve the Santander region with top quality financial education products. Over time, its founder Roberto Claro managed to identify very specific needs in terms of financial guidance in the Spanish-speaking population and evolved its business model by creating three lines of service to address and solve different problems and needs that involve money as a tool: Investments and Wealth Management, professional trading in international financial markets and a specific line of personal and family finances.
aboutUs.Maximizar la rentabilidad de nuestros cl: Maximize the profitability of our clients through a relationship based on trust, training and support in making financial decisions with a unique and timely service style.
aboutUs.A medio plazo, convertirse en la platafo: RCA Capital was born as a company destined to manage the Claro Araque family assets as well as to serve the Santander region with top quality financial education products. Over time, its founder Roberto Claro managed to identify very specific needs in terms of financial guidance in the Spanish-speaking population and evolved its business model by creating three lines of service to address and solve different problems and needs that involve money as a tool: Investments and Wealth Management, professional trading in international financial markets and a specific line of personal and family finances.
aboutUs.¿Cómo le servimos a nuestros clientes?: How do we serve our clients?
aboutUs.Videocursos con técnicas sencillas, prác: Video courses with simple, practical and effective techniques that aim to transform our client's vision and knowledge about money as a concept and financial markets as a tool to create wealth.
aboutUs.Seminarios y mentorías que permiten prof: Seminars and mentoring that allow us to deepen the shared topics and experiences lived throughout our journey in the financial sector.
aboutUs.Soluciones personalizadas y específicas: Personalized and specific solutions generated by our technology.
aboutUs.Ser el socio estratégico principal de nu: To be the main strategic partner of our clients for managing their investments and making their financial decisions.
aboutUs.RCA promueve y transforma a través de nu: RCA promotes and transforms, through our knowledge, software development into innovative vehicles for decision-making together with our network of allies with experience and value in international financial markets.
aboutUs.Seriedad, profesionalidad, confidenciali: Seriousness, professionalism, confidentiality and impartiality is our work scheme.
aboutUs.RCA se compromete con la sociedad en la: RCA is committed to society in sustainable and inclusive financial education and planning at the personal, family and business level, thus promoting the maintenance of a transparent and reliable investment climate.
